subject: Registration of employees of NHAI on attendance.gov.in
text: IRdty <744 TrTHrf xifec<ut (Hem Wav7 ak {TzHRf `ArT4) 844 Phone 91.11-25074100/25074200 54_ Fax   91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 Q 6, tazr-10 , ERT, # Ravit-110075 6-5 & 6 Seclor-10,_ Dwarka New Delhi-110075 No.11041/283-Misc/2014-Misc: Dated: 19.1.2015 CIRCULAR Sub: Aadhaar based Biometric Attendance System 1 As part of the 'Digital India" programme of Government of India, it has been decided by Gol to implement common Biometric Attendance System (BAS) in all the Central Government Offices all over India; Department of Personnel & Training has issued OM No.- 11013/9/2014-Estt(A-III) dated  21.11.14 in this regard, BAS has to be installed in all the offices of Central Government including attached/Sub-ordinate offices in Delhi/New Delhi by 31" Dec 2014., 2. Keeping in view the guidelines, all employees of NHAI have to register on attendance-gov.in. Form for registration is mandatory and is to be filled by all emplovees/contract employees/consultants it is enclosed as Appendix-"A" AlI employees should  furnish one photograph and of Aadhaar Card alongwith the form duly signed. copy 3 Division wise applications duly consolidated be forwarded in one lot 27th January 2015 for collective uploading at attendance E by gov.in. 4 This has the approval of competent authority: (Col.S.S_Kapur) GM(HR/Admn)-I PS to Chairman PS to all Members CVO All CGMs GMs All Officers Employees of NHAI HQs to Web Admn: for circulation Mntl WEL Diety Copy
